flavorText:
"I can think of worse ways to go. On second thought, maybe not."
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

foreignData.flavorText: „Ich kann mir ein schlimmeres Ende ausmalen. Hmmm, vielleicht doch nicht."—Ludevic, Nekro-Alchemist
foreignData.name: Knochen zu Asche
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Kreaturenzauber deiner Wahl.Ziehe eine Karte.

foreignData.flavorText: "Puedo imaginar peores maneras de partir. Ahora que lo pienso, tal vez no".—Ludevic, necro-alquimista
foreignData.name: Huesos en cenizas
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo de criatura objetivo.Roba una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: « Ce n'est pas la pire façon de mourir. Après réflexion, peut-être que si. »—Ludevic, nécro-alchimiste
foreignData.name: Os en cendres
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort de créature ciblé.Piochez une carte.

foreignData.flavorText: "Mi vengono in mente modi peggiori per andarsene. A pensarci bene, forse no."—Ludevic, necro-alchimista
foreignData.name: Ossa in Cenere
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia creatura bersaglio.Pesca una carta.

foreignData.flavorText: 「もっと悪い死にようも考え得る。いや待てよ、そうでもないか。」――屍錬金術師、ルーデヴィック
foreignData.name: 骨を灰に
foreignData.text: クリーチャー・呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。カードを１枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: "더 처참하게 죽는 방법이야 많... 은 게 아니라 없군."—사령연금술사 루데비치
foreignData.name: 뼈에서 재로
foreignData.text: 생물 주문을 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다.카드 한 장을 뽑는다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Posso imaginar meios piores de partir. Pensando bem, acho que não."— Ludevic, necroalquimista
foreignData.name: De Ossos a Cinzas
foreignData.text: Anule a mágica de criatura alvo.Compre um card.

foreignData.flavorText: «Есть смерти и похуже. Хотя нет, пожалуй, нет».— Людевик, некроалхимик
foreignData.name: Из Костей в Прах

foreignData.flavorText: 「我能想到更糟的告别法。不过仔细想想，那也许还算不上。」～死灵炼金术士卢德维
foreignData.name: 白骨化灰
foreignData.text: 反击目标生物咒语。抓一张牌。

foreignData.flavorText: 「我能想到更糟的告別法。不過仔細想想，那也許還算不上。」～死靈鍊金術士盧德維
foreignData.name: 白骨化灰
foreignData.text: 反擊目標生物咒語。抽一張牌。

name: Bone to Ash
originalText:
Counter target creature spell.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: A creature spell that can’t be countered is a legal target for Bone to Ash. The creature spell won’t be countered when Bone to Ash resolves, but you’ll still draw a card.

text:
Counter target creature spell.
Draw a card.
